data.market_trends: There is a growing trend towards sustainable travel, with tourists looking for eco-friendly accommodations and tours that support local communities.
data.consumer_behavior: Travelers today prefer authentic experiences over luxurious accommodations and are more inclined to engage with local cultures and environments.
data.competitive_landscape: Guatemala positions itself as a leading destination for cultural tourism, competing with other Central American countries by emphasizing its unique Mayan history and natural landscapes.
data.seasonal_factors: The best time for travels aligns with the dry season, particularly for exploring outdoor attractions like Tikal and Lake Atitlan.
